title: Performing action on selection of text in webview android
body:
I am creating a rich text editor in android using webview.

I have implemented all the features, and now I am working on improving it.

What I need is that, whenever some text is selected in webview, an action is performed automatically based on the selected text without any click or touch.

I have been successful in retrieving the text and performing action on button click, but facing problems when I have to retrieve the text when it is selected or the selection range is changed.

Any help will be appreciated. THanks in advance! :D
